ing: 2 cups corn kernels, thawed if frozen
1 teaspoon lemon juice, or more to taste
des: "The original recipe (clipped from a Korean newspaper) called it corn mayonnaise. We prefer it thicker, like a hummus. Hearty and somewhat sweet, this is great as a dip. It's also tasty as a spread on sandwiches!"
ins: Place corn, cashews, lemon juice, salt, onion powder, and garlic powder in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy, about 1 minute.
